sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da je nekdo ali nekaj
a nuisance
, pomeni, da nas vznemirja ali nam povzroča težave.

seg.quote: It was a nuisance for them to have all these visitors sitting around.
I'm sorry to be such a nuisance.

sense.def:
To make a nuisance of oneself
pomeni, da se nekdo vede tako, da vznemirja druge.
